price: Quienes transmiten el Mensaje de Dios y tienen temor de Él, sin temer a nadie salvo a Él, sepan que Dios computa todas las obras.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuballighūna risālāti al-lahi wayakhshawnahu walā yakhshawna aḥadan illā al-laha wakafā bil-lahi ḥasīban
